statements: SELECT * FROM SalesData
SELECT sales_id, product_id, sales_amount FROM SalesData
SELECT product_id, sale_date FROM SalesData WHERE sales_amount > 1000
SELECT * FROM SalesData WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT customer_id, SUM(sales_amount) AS total_sales FROM SalesData GROUP BY customer_id
SELECT sales_id, product_id, sale_date, sales_amount, customer_id FROM SalesData WHERE sales_id = 100;
SELECT product_id, sales_amount, sale_date, customer_id, sales_id FROM SalesData WHERE sales_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM SalesData WHERE customer_id = 500 AND sales_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT AVG(sales_amount) as average_sales_amount, MAX(sales_amount) as max_sales_amount, MIN(sales_amount) as min_sales_amount FROM SalesData;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(sales_id) as total_sales FROM SalesData GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(sales_id) > 2 ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, product_name FROM sales_data WHERE unit_price > 50.00;
SELECT sale_date, product_name, quantity FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM sales_data WHERE quantity >= 100 ORDER BY unit_price ASC;
SELECT sale_date, forecasted_quantity, actual_quantity FROM sales_analytics WHERE sale_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY sale_date DESC
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM sales_data WHERE unit_price > 50
SELECT sale_id, unit_price, quantity FROM sales_data WHERE product_name = 'Product A' AND quantity < 20
SELECT sd.sale_id, sa.forecasted_quantity, sa.actual_quantity FROM sales_data sd JOIN sales_analytics sa ON sd.sale_id = sa.sale_id
SELECT sale_date, product_name, unit_price, quantity FROM sales_data ORDER BY product_name ASC, unit_price DESC
SELECT * FROM Sales WHERE order_id = 1001;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM Customers;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM Products WHERE stock_quantity > 0;
SELECT order_id, order_date, quantity, price FROM Sales WHERE price > 50.00;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 2002;
SELECT * FROM Sales WHERE order_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, address FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT order_id, product_name, quantity, price FROM Sales JOIN Products ON Sales.product_id = Products.product_id ORDER BY order_date DESC;

SELECT customer_name, product_name, quantity, price FROM Customers JOIN Sales ON Customers.customer_id = Sales.order_id JOIN Products ON Sales.product_id = Products.product_id WHERE order_date < '2022-08-01';
SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT product_name, sale_date, sale_amount FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT category, COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM products GROUP BY category;
SELECT * FROM sales_forecast WHERE confidence_level > 0.8 ORDER BY forecast_date;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE product_name LIKE '%iPhone%' ORDER BY sale_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND price < 500 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT forecast_id, forecast_date, predicted_sales FROM sales_forecast WHERE confidence_level > 0.8 ORDER BY forecast_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM products
SELECT product_name, category, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price > 100
SELECT customer_name, contact_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC
SELECT product_name, category FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics'
SELECT sale_date, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE contact_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT product_name, category, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price > 100;
SELECT customer_name, sale_date, sale_amount FROM customers c JOIN sales_data s ON c.customer_id = s.customer_id;
SELECT product_name, sale_date, sale_amount FROM products p JOIN sales_revenue sr ON p.product_id = sr.product_id ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
